context: In this module MonetX is fetching data of configured IP on the network devices physical interfaces SVi and Virtual interfaces LIKE  HSRP, VRRP & LB virtual IP. It is also s the interface description, vlan name, subnet, Subnets mask and the status of the physical interface up or down. The benefit of this module is to track any ip from the dashboard & does not need to login to device. in monetX it have capability to add DHCP server as a node and fetch the IP scopes information like Scope name, Lease, used addresses, free addresses etc. and you can manually and  dynamically discover subnets in your environment to get there IP details like where it is configured. Mac address and which ports are open on that IP address and it is also maintaining the ip history with time series if these is MAC change on specific IP it will prompt.

qas.question: What is use of IPAM in MonetX?

answers.text: In this module MonetX is fetching data of configured IP on the network devices physical interfaces SVi and Virtual interfaces LIKE  HSRP, VRRP & LB virtual IP. It is also s the interface description, vlan name, subnet, Subnets mask and the status of the physical interface up or down. The benefit of this module is to track any ip from the dashboard & does not need to login to device. in monetX it have capability to add DHCP server as a node and fetch the IP scopes information like Scope name, Lease, used addresses, free addresses etc. and you can manually and  dynamically discover subnets in your environment to get there IP details like where it is configured. Mac address and which ports are open on that IP address and it is also maintaining the ip history with time series if these is MAC change on specific IP it will prompt.

context:
Inventory
To deal with rapid technological advancements, businesses often make changes to their network infrastructure, which can create a lot of problems. Manually tracking and compiling data is a time-consuming process that often leads to overlooking devices, entering data incorrectly, and making compilation errors. Therefore, every business needs a network inventory management tool to organize and manage network configurations. When it comes to managing network devices and organizing network assets to track configurations, a network inventory management software is vital.
Let's look at the different components that make up holistic network inventory management system:

There 2 methods to add device in MonetX 1: Static one be one & 2: Import excel sheet (Atom) which contains list of devices such as IP address, Location, Rack detail, SW type ETC. Once devices are added in Atom with static information. Tool have button to onboard device this algorithm will communicate will devices over the (SSH, APIs, SMNP) and get dynamic information from the devices like status, Serial No, PN code, patch Version, Manufacturer, vendor and HW version along with this our system have capability to fetch information of  boards, sub Boards and SFPs, like if the there is a stack switch it will show the stack members and all information of each stack member. In sub boards our tool is dynamically fetching information power supplies, fan tray, ethernet and SFP module, supervisor engines and route processors. In SFP our tool is fetching information of each SFP like SFP model, Speed, Mode, Serial No. Manufacturer, wave length, PN code and the name of the port where it is connected.


Data Center Capacity Management
In DCM module our tool fetching the information of total interface counts, connected, and not connected ports counts & also It will show the count of all unused SFPs for all variations like 1G, 10G, 40G and 100G. With this data you can do any type of analytics like total unused SFP, total Connected ports etc

IPAM
In this module MonetX is fetching data of configured IP on the network devices physical interfaces, VLAN interfaces and Virtual IP like HSRP or VRRP. It is also storing the interface description, vlan name, subnet, Subnets mask and the status of the physical and the admin interface up or down. The benefit of this module is to track any ip from the dashboard & does not need to login to device. in monetX it have capability to add DHCP server as a node and fetch the IP scopes information like Scope name, Lease, used addresses, free addresses etc. and you can manually and  dynamically discover subnets in your environment to get there IP details like where it is configured and which ports are open on that IP address

qas.question: What is the requirements of installing the MonetX?

answers.text:

context: Small Form-factor Pluggable is a compact, hot-pluggable network interface module format used for both telecommunication and data communications applications. An SFP interface on networking hardware is a modular slot for a media-specific transceiver, such as for a fiber-optic cable or a copper cable

qas.question: What is SFPS?

answers.text: Small Form-factor Pluggable is a compact, hot-pluggable network interface module format used for both telecommunication and data communications applications. An SFP interface on networking hardware is a modular slot for a media-specific transceiver, such as for a fiber-optic cable or a copper cable
